author: geuerp
msg: The XMLSignatureInput now reads all octets (bytes) from a given InputStream.
There have been problems that files could not be deleted after signature creation because of open file handles.

author: geuerp
msg: The Canonicalizer now offers the canonicalizeSubtree(Node) and canonicalizeXPathNodeSet(NodeList) methods for canonicalization. All others have been deprecated.
This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create tag 'v1_0_2'.
